column5: 25 rods is good to have in the boat you might have a drunk in the boat, he might fall and break 24 of them lol
Not a chance of that happening.
Maybe not in your boat john,don't under estimate a drunk moving around in a boat full of rods lol

Just asking for trouble with drunks on the water.Dont mind guys bringing a couple of beers for shorelunch even though thats against the law but a cooler full not going to happen.Iam responsible for what happens to my guests on guide days.

Headed out on Eagle Yesterday morning from Vermilion Bay.Attempted to go catch a Big lake trout.Fished a couple of hours and saw lots of fish on sonar.Nothing would bite until a bit later.Instead of lake trout in 50 ft of water it was walleye.So quite fishing there in case i caught slot fish.First walleye that came up was toast but a 17 incher so got lucky there.Besides that had a awesome morning taking in the beautifull veiw around.Nice weather and no one else out.
I believe I saw you. Went by you with an orange box on the back of my machine.
saw you.You should off stopped by.What a beautifull day.
Only had one casualty.Lot of sonar action but not much biting going on.Dont know if some marks where trout and just not biting or all walleyes.
Looks like a place where I want to be right about now
I know you would have loved it.
I like your hat john,I was running one for a few hours this morning
I ran mine yesterday and wikl be going out shortly to cut some more.Have 2 of them.ms 291.
Good to have 2 one for each hand,you can get a lot done running 2 saws at once,but make sure you have plenty of band aids on hand
There both right handed.lol.2 are good when you go in bush to cut wood.Even the wood i have brought in.dint need a break down and no back up.Just like bringing 25 rods aking in your boat.eh.lol.
